text_block_list.name: Santa Claus
text_block_list.text: Ho ho ho ho!

text_block_list.name: Santa Claus
text_block_list.text: A joyous day to you, Oguri Cap!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Santa! Hello... Oh, right. It's already<n>the holiday season.

text_block_list.name: Santa Claus
text_block_list.text: I've got a card and a present with<n>your name on 'em.

text_block_list.name: Santa Claus
text_block_list.text: I'm off then! Have a merry one! Ho<n>ho ho!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Hey, thanks! I'm sure you've got a<n>lot more work to do, but
I'll be<n>cheering for you! Now then...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
"Dear Oguri Cap, You are formally<n>invited to our year-end
holiday party.<n>From your fans"

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: A holiday party...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
That would be so uplifting! Oh, the<n>present... Hm, it's from
the URA?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Gasp! This is...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
"With permission from Tracen, your<n>fans have volunteered
to prepare a<n>delicious feast and throw a party to<n>help raise
your racing spirits."

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
A feast! "We would be delighted if<n>this event leaves you
encouraged for<n>your next race. If possible, please<n>attend
in this signature racewear."

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Sigh... "We look forward toseeing you." Yeah... Me too.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: So you're invited to a party that's<n>being held by your fans.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hayahide... Uh, how'd you know?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Heh... Well, you just said so out loud.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Though you seemed to pause at the<n>mention of your
racewear. Is<n>something the matter?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Actually... the URA once told me they<n>were making new
signature racewear<n>for me, in honor of my achievements.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I've heard. Congratulations.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Thanks. But the design wasn't<n>finished at all... They told me
they had<n>the perfect idea to help after seeing<n>me fret
about it.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Apparently, the plan was for the fans<n>to come up with
designs. They got<n>quite a few made with me in mind.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
They showed them to me, and<n>they're really cool... I just
had to ask<n>if they'd let me use one of the<n>designs.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
That's something. So you're going to<n>attend a fan party in
racewear that<n>embodies their enthusiasm for you...<n>Isn't
that simply wonderful?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Yeah, it really makes me happy. I<n>mean, I'm happy, but...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Something's wrong with me recently.<n>My races haven't
been going as well<n>as I thought they would.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Even in important races, I couldn't<n>give the people watching
me what<n>they deserve. They believed in my<n>ability, but I let
them all down...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Still, they thought up a stunning<n>design for me to wear on
the track. It<n>makes me... Well, I don't know how<n>to put it.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
...In other words, you're excited for<n>the party and happy
with the racewear<n>they made, but you're saddened...<n>that
you haven't repaid them?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Ah, yeah. That's what I feel! But<n>how'd you know? Just
like Tama...<n>but no Kansai accent. Maybe it's the<n>glasses?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Er, glasses? I-I was merely<n>conjecturing. Anyway, your
fans must<n>have a strong desire to cheer you on.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
And it's all because you appeal to<n>them so much. The
intention they have<n>with this party is purely to encourage<n>
you.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Why don't you set racing aside for<n>the moment and really
enjoy yourself<n>there? I surmise that would be the<n>best
way to repay their consideration.<n>Well then, have a happy
holiday.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Thank you! You too, Hayahide! ...I can<n>repay their
consideration, huh?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
That's right. It's a special holiday<n>after all. I'd love to give
them a great<n>present too.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
But... what would be good? This<n>season's known for...
chicken over<n>rice, turkey, stew, fries, simmered<n>fish...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Salad, pasta, sautés, steamed buns,<n>borscht... Things with
difficult names,<n>things with fun names...

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text: Oh, Oguri! Hey, everyone! Oguri just<n>got here!
Clap, clap, clap!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Whoa?! Where am I? There's turkey,<n>and even chicken
over rice!

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text: We're right in the middle of preparingfor the party! But oh my gosh, Oguri!That racewear! Sniffle! It looks amazing on you!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Fan A
text_block_list.text: Y-you're just... so cool! Sob!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Uh... Wh-why are you crying?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Fan A
text_block_list.text: You see, everyone here had a hand indesigning it! And now that you'reactually here, wearing it, I just...Cry!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
You designed it... To tell the truth, I<n>was shocked when I first
saw it—to<n>think that you felt so strongly about<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Thank you. This present that you've<n>given me... makes me
really happy.

text_block_list.name: Child Fan A
text_block_list.text: Hey, Oguri. We worked really hardtoo! We made a big star for the treeoutside! It's huge!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
The tree outside... Ah, you mean the<n>one that's even bigger
than this cabin!<n>But I didn't see any decorations on<n>it...

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
We made it just about as large as a<n>real star! It's taking
some extra time<n>to bring it up the mountain, but don't<n>
worry! It'll be up before the party<n>starts!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Wow... Thanks so much, everyone.<n>This is all so exciting.
I'm so glad.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: But I didn't bring anything...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I wonder if anyone will mind if I step<n>out for a moment. I
just... really want<n>to see the snow.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
Not at all! Feel free to take a stroll until<n>the party starts! I'm
sure it'll be fine,<n>but do take care. The weather on<n>these
mountains tends to be a bit<n>blustery!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: This is bad... I need to find a present<n>for them, fast!
Hm? Say, is that...
